learnitdown v1.3.1

learnitdown: 'SciViews' - R Markdown, Bookdown and Learnr Additions for Learning Material

Source: R/learnitdown-package.R
learnitdown-package.Rd

Extension to R Markdown, Bookdown and Learnr for building better learning and e-learning material: H5P integration, course-contextual divs, differed loading of Shiny and learnr applications, and much more ...

Details

The SciViews learnitdown package provides additional R Markdown tags to build richer learning material with interactivity and to manage H5P exercises, learnr tutorials and Shiny interactive applications with user identification and activity tracking in a MongoDB database.

See h5p() or launch_shiny()

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/SciViews/learnitdown

  • https://www.sciviews.org/learnitdown/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/SciViews/learnitdown/issues
